img_above_text:
![Wukong Pagoda 104.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/73/Wukong_Pagoda_104.jpg)
Crossing a short rope bridge high above the gorge you came in through, you'll reach a large rocky snowfield with low visibility due to snowy winds. Many Frozen Corpses are scattered around this area can be tough to pick out as you advance, so move cautiously.
img_below_text:
Be sure to check the right corner first to find Tree Pearls to harvest, and a floating green Wisp in the left corner to absorb.
Making your way up the snowfield, the winds will die down as the giant titular pagoda of this realm appears to loom up in front of you. This may seem like the main path to advance, but in reality it's more of a teaser.
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Pagoda 104.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/73/Wukong_Pagoda_104.jpg)
Crossing a short rope bridge high above the gorge you came in through, you'll reach a large rocky snowfield with low visibility due to snowy winds. Many Frozen Corpses are scattered around this area can be tough to pick out as you advance, so move cautiously."
        - Following Text: "Be sure to check the right corner first to find Tree Pearls to harvest, and a floating green Wisp in the left corner to absorb.
Making your way up the snowfield, the winds will die down as the giant titular pagoda of this realm appears to loom up in front of you. This may seem like the main path to advance, but in reality it's more of a teaser."

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character is navigating a snowy landscape with low visibility due to snowy winds. The character is advancing through a large rocky snowfield, where Frozen Corpses are scattered, requiring cautious movement. The image serves as a visual representation of the challenging environment described in the text, highlighting the need for careful exploration to find Tree Pearls and a floating green Wisp, as well as the looming pagoda that appears as the winds die down.
